**Examples**

```esql
ROW a = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5], b = [2, 3, 4, 5, 6]
| EVAL finalValue = MV_UNION(a, b)
| KEEP finalValue
```

| finalValue:integer |
| --- |
| [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6] |

```esql
ROW a = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]::long, b = [2, 3, 4, 5, 6]::long
| EVAL finalValue = MV_UNION(a, b)
| KEEP finalValue
```

| finalValue:long |
| --- |
| [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6] |

```esql
ROW a = [true, false], b = [false]
| EVAL finalValue = MV_UNION(a, b)
| KEEP finalValue
```

| finalValue:boolean |
| --- |
| [true, false] |

```esql
ROW a = [5.2, 10.5, 1.12345], b = [10.5, 2.6928]
| EVAL finalValue = MV_UNION(a, b)
| KEEP finalValue
```

| finalValue:double |
| --- |
| [5.2, 10.5, 1.12345, 2.6928] |

```esql
ROW a = ["one", "two", "three"], b = ["two", "four"]
| EVAL finalValue = MV_UNION(a, b)
| KEEP finalValue
```

| finalValue:keyword |
| --- |
| ["one", "two", "three", "four"] |
